DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : -Determine specific exercise regimen ( combined strength training/functional endurance ) reduce level fatigue among woman breast cancer undergo adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy treatment compare control group . Secondary Objectives : - Determine specific exercise regimen ( combined strength training/functional endurance ) increase overall ability perform daily physical activity ( ADLs ) among woman breast cancer undergo adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy treatment compare control group . - Determine specific exercise regimen ( combined strength training/ functional endurance ) increase mobility woman breast cancer undergo adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy treatment compare control group . - Determine specific exercise regimen ( combined strength training/functional endurance ) increase endurance woman breast cancer undergo adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Strength Training Functional Endurance Exercise Regimen Cancer -Related Fatigue Physical Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Cancer-related fatigue describe common troubling side effect cancer cancer treatment . Researchers want see strength-training walk exercise regimen may help reduce severe fatigue increase patient ' ability perform activity daily live . If agree take part study , complete questionnaire , provide contact information , participate 1 2 group . For questionnaire , ask information age , ethnic origin , marital status , education , exercise habit , cancer diagnosis . It take 5 minute complete . For contact information , ask provide name , address , telephone number someone call case emergency . After complete questionnaire provide contact information , randomly assign ( toss coin ) 1 2 group . Participants exercise group teach perform specific regimen strength-training walking exercise . Participants nonexercise group follow usual routine standard care taught perform specific regimen strength-training walking exercise . Participants nonexercise group ask keep record exercise do participant 's personal regimen part study . You equal chance assign either group . All participant study ask complete questionnaire ( Schwartz Fatigue Scale , Karnofsky Performance Scale , International Physical Activity Questionnaire [ IPAQ ] ) Breast Center Clinic begin chemotherapy treatment . The Schwartz Fatigue Scale IPAQ also complete chemotherapy treatment . All questionnaire use provide information physical activity much time spend . It take 25-30 minute complete 3 questionnaire . No matter group , questionnaires complete , physical therapist escort exercise room locate Physical Therapy Rehabilitation Clinic . The therapist perform lymphedema ( excess fluid collection ) evaluation involve measure size arm hand place tape measure around arm hand 5 different point . The lymphedema evaluation do clinic visit come chemotherapy 2 week complete therapy . You also ask complete exercise testing , Estimated Timed-Get-Up Go test ( ETGUPGo ) 6-minute walk test , check level fatigue physical ability . This exercise test perform begin chemotherapy within 2 week finish last chemotherapy treatment . The exercise test do chemotherapy treatment researcher compare level fatigue physical performance experience therapy begin . The ETGUPGo test measure fast rise chair , walk 4 yard , turnaround return chair , sit . For 6-minute walk test therapist ask walk around exercise room pace therapist count total time able walk . Two ( 2 ) week finish treatment , re-take Schwartz Fatigue Scale , Karnofsky Scale , IPAQ , ETGUPGo , 6-minute walk test . Your exercise test do private , mean one study staff allow enter room test . If assign group specific exercise regimen , teach strengthen walk exercise . For strengthen regimen , teach stretch Theraband ( material look like big rubber band ) far arm legs stretch . You teach perform exercise home . You able look picture exercise booklet provide . You ask perform exercise 3-5 time per week . For walk regimen , teach proper posture walk exercise . You must walk least per day , otherwise may walk often long feel like . You also exercise test . The therapist measure length arm legs see much force take stretch rubber band beyond length arm leg . The therapist test current muscle strength ask sit rise chair , walk certain distance , return chair . You also ask walk certain distance get tire . The therapist record much time take complete exercise ( strengthen walk ) . After begin exercise home , research nurse call every 2 week ask many time perform strengthen exercise throughout week well average amount time walk day . The phone call last 10-15 minute time . You ask check box exercise calendar ( provide ) show exercise able perform day . All exercise test give day routine visit clinic . Your participation complete study perform last exercise testing ( 2 week last chemotherapy treatment ) . This investigational study . However , begin experience emotional distress directly relate study , may refer professional counseling M. D. Anderson Social Work Department . The social service staff available assist referral outside M. D. Anderson system . Up 58 patient take part study . All enrol M. D. Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must clinical diagnosis breast cancer ( Stages I III ) , 2. age 21 60 year ; 3. may undergo definitive surgical procedure ( lumpectomy mastectomy ) , 4. schedule receive chemotherapy/hormonal blocker regimen appropriate treatment breast cancer ( neoadjuvant adjuvant ) 5. approval Oncologist responsible oversee cancer treatment plan patient participate study . 1 . Exclusion criterion include presence concomitant major health problem exercise regimen contraindicate ( e.g . cardiac , pulmonary , orthopedic ) 2 . Currently participate structure exercise program define regular walking , stretch , dance type exercise perform least 30 minute great time 3 time per week . 3 . Women breast reconstructive surgery . 4 . Men diagnose breast cancer .
